nodes.description: I was on the CBC again! Kady Wong and I representedRepair Matters on BC Today this afternoon. You can listen to the segment here. It starts at 33:30.
I made some pretty images using Andy Doro’s 3-state cellular automata tool and my CA finder! Each of the 4 final images can be clicked for a slightly higher-res video.
I've been exploring MagicaVoxel with herlifeinpixels and wanted to try rendering a few images: …and a bonus render using Mandelbulber 2:
